description: Job Duties: ·       Supervise day-to-day operation of warehousing and logistics functions, assist top management to develop and implement strategies align with organizational goals and optimize efficiency ·       Conduct regular inventory audits, reconcile discrepancies and implement best practices for inventory control ·       Assist top management to develop and implement logistics strategies to optimize transportation routes, reduce costs and improve service levels ·       Assign tasks and set goals in the department, ensure team members are effectively executing their responsibilities ·       Monitor team performance and provide feedback, coaching, and support to improve productivity and efficiency ·       Conduct regular meeting with top management to review department goals, performance metrics and operational issues ·       Manage relationships with suppliers, carriers, and third-party logistics providers, negotiate contracts and ensure that services meet the company’s standards and requirements
